posts.title: Generalized linear model(GLM)
posts.text: Ordinary linear regression linear-response model normal distribution of response variable response variable 和 error是同类型的分布 E = R - w*x link function of response y’ = f(y) = y 有什么问题？ 如果Y不是正态分布会怎么样？ Y和X是线性关系 overdispersion homogeneity of variance GLM Model assumptions distribution of response variable(exponential family) bernoulli() log-odds(logit) logit quantile function of logistic distribution quantile function is inverses of the cumulative distribution function (CDF) of a probability distribution binomial distribution is the sum of independent and identically distributed Bernoulli random variables. X =X1+⋯+Xn poisson link function of response variable(arbitrary) logit = link(y) predictor(Systematic Component) => link => response(Random Component) maximum likelihood estimation(MLE) large-sample approximations minimize neg-likelihood (maximize a posterior) MAP: bayes MLE = MAP with uniform prior 模型评估 参数解释 Model fit: R^2^, residual analysis, F-statistic 问题？ 线性模型 Responses must be independent categorical(nominal) ordinal numerical(equally spaced ordinal) Reference[1] Ordinary least squares [2] Generalized linear model [3] What is the difference and relationship between the binomial and Bernoulli distributions? [4] 6.1 - Introduction to Generalized Linear Models | STAT 504 [5] MLE vs MAP: the connection between Maximum Likelihood and Maximum A Posteriori Estimation

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: unix常用命令
posts.text: Ubuntu通过命令行连接WIFIiwconfigsudo ip link set wlan0 upsudo iw dev wlan0 scan | lesssudo apt install wpasupplicantsudo vim /etc/wpasupplicant/wpa_supplicant.confsudo wpa_supplicant -i wlan0 -c /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf &sudo dhclient wlan0通过iwconfig命令, 查看wlan0是否已经连接上相应SSID的WIFI, 或者通过ping尝试联网. ssh保持连接 vim /etc/ssh/sshd_config ClientAliveInterval 60 ClientAliveCountMax 3 service sshd reload Insecure completion-dependent directories detected: rz/sz add new sudo user bash complement psprocess status git git config –global core.quotepath false ssd 其实不需要什么优化。 鼠标设置 docker NVIDA驱动 禁用nouveau驱动 reboot sudo ./NVIDIA-Linux-x86_64-396.18.run -no-x-check -no-nouveau-check -no-opengl-files zerotier sudo vim /etc/sudoers Defaults env_reset,timestamp_timeout=-1 rsync -a 复制目录 cp -dpr / rsync -avz foo:src/bar /data/tmp #原路径没有/表示拷贝这个文件夹 rsync -avz foo:src/bar==/== /data/tmp #有/表示这个文件夹下的内容 目标路径带/有什么作用吗？ dnsmasq 没有什么必要, 还是有必要的 /etc/dnsmasq.conf /etc/dnsmasq.resolv.conf /etc/defulat/dnsmasq 如果安装了resolvconf包，dnsmasq将会使用resolvconf的输出，而不是使用/etc/resolv.conf文件的内容，去发现上游名字服务器 IGNORE_RESOLVCONF=yes /etc/inputrc bash历史 “\e[5~”: history-search-backward 1gsettings set com.canonical.Unity.Launcher launcher-position Bottom 开机自动挂载硬盘 sudo vim /etc/fstab UUID=11263962-9715-473f-9421-0b604e895aaa /data ext4 defaults 0 1 LABEL=OSDisk /media/litk/OSDisk ntfs defaults 0 1 LABEL=NewDisk /media/litk/NewDisk ntfs defaults 0 1 UUID 从sudo blkid获得 sudo mount -a命令验证一下配置是否正确 参考ubuntu开机自动挂载新硬盘 开机启动 systemctl service /etc/init.d/ 添加启动脚本#! /bin/sh sudo update-rc.d ss_local.sh defaults 90 /etc/rc.local Dash设置 系统设置-privacy 定时任务 vim /etc/crontab crontab -e webDAV iterm2
